an8.71:1.1: “Saddho ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti, no ca silava.
an8.71:1.5: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti silava ca,
an8.71:2.1: Saddho ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti silava ca, no ca bahussuto.
an8.71:2.4: ‘kintaham saddho ca assam, silava ca, bahussuto ca’ti.
an8.71:2.5: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti silava ca bahussuto ca,
an8.71:3.1: Saddho ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti silava ca bahussuto ca, no ca dhammakathiko …pe…
an8.71:3.3: parisavacaro ca, no ca visarado parisaya dhammam deseti …pe…
an8.71:3.4: visarado ca parisaya dhammam deseti, no ca catunnam jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi …pe…
an8.71:3.5: catunnam jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi, no ca asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati;
an8.71:3.8: ‘kintaham saddho ca assam, silava ca, bahussuto ca, dhammakathiko ca, parisavacaro ca, visarado ca parisaya dhammam deseyyam, catunnanca jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi assam akicchalabhi akasiralabhi, asavananca khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
an8.71:4.1: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti, silava ca, bahussuto ca, dhammakathiko ca, parisavacaro ca, visarado ca parisaya dhammam deseti, catunnanca jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi, asavananca khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati;
an8.71:4.3: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, atthahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu samantapasadiko ca hoti sabbakaraparipuro ca”ti.
